intro: Dryopsis kawakamii, commonly known as Kawakami's dryopsis, is a flowering plant native to Japan. It thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in forested areas. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and private collections.
